summary:
Finally a simple and a easy mod to use so just download and enjoy :) 

This mod adds a new race to the game called \"Dremora\" this is a dark race and is really badass with the evilness ;) 

hate being a good guy? 
Sure this is for you :)

-Installation-
Just extract the file to your skyrim data folder.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2lnu3p0.png[/IMG]

Dremora 1.1 By Baloch Â©

Finally a simple and a easy mod to use so just download and enjoy :)

This mod adds a new race to the game called \"[color=red]Dremora[/color]\" this is a dark race and is really badass with the evilness ;) 

hate being a good guy? 
Sure this is for you :)

------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=red][size=5]-Installation-[/size][/color]
-Installation-
1. Open The winrar file
2. Just extract the files in the rar to your skyrim DATA folder.
3. Enjoy/Play :)!
------------------------------------------------------------------

Remember Dremora is not a Ingame Race so NOT every clothes will be available right now my dremora character is wearing BLACK ROBES so you should try and find clothes that your dremora can wear.!!

If you wanna change your race to dremora simply bring up your console and type in \"[color=green]showracemenu[/color]\" then you can repick your race and be a badass dremora

[size=5][color=red] I also RECOMMEND you to download this mod manually not by NMM.[/color][/size]

--------------------------------------
[size=2]-Special Spells-[/size]

[color=red]Banish Daedra
Detect Dead
Detect Life[/color] 
-------------------------------------

-----------------------------------
[size=2]-Skill Bonus-[/size]

[color=red]Block = 5
Heavy Armor = 10
One-Handed = 10
Sneak = 10 
Two-Handed = 5
Speech = 10
Smithing = 5[/color]
[color=green]Total = 55[/color]
-----------------------------------

[size=3]Also if you cant see your dremora\'s hair then try wearing a helmet and removing the helmet that should bring the hair i think.[/size]

Please if you like it then Rate/endors ;/ this is my first ever mod lol.[/center]
author: Baloch
